Blog.post: hMmm..todAe veri tireD..lol..my bro wake me up!!lol..i nv hear my alarm colock ring!!so piggY!!haha,,den went to class..den study..den assembly is the opera thingy..quite nice..but dunno wa dit toking abt..haha..den went jia liang hse there..plae bball..lol..actualy dun wanna go..hmmm den afternoon eat western food"chicken chop"..den plae bball..till abt 5..den sit down..drink drink..den go to bus stop at 5.45..wait till 6.10 den bus come..!!! so latE..haha while waiting for the bus..ivinn perform "NDP parT 2"me,jia liang ,darrly..there assist him..hab fun..den reach home at 7+..going to 8..den chat wif michelle on fone for a while..miSS her sho much!!!lub her too!!..haha..den go home...actually 7.45 reach home...den my family going eat dinner ma..den i cannot dun go..den hide at 10 floor till they go out..lol..*smart*sho i can chat wif michelle..and online..dun wan go eat..i guez..nt gona eat dinner..hehe..hmm..plaegng games..oh ya..afternoon..abt eveining..michelle ask me go find her at library..but nv go..sob sob..cannot late ma..den cannot go..regret..tink she angry ba..sorry k?..muackkZZ(K)haha=P..i stop here..haben bath yet..smelly!!lol..buaix!!muackZZ

hMmm todAe[22/08/04] wakE up at 11+..loL so tireD ytd chaT on fonE wif my frienz michEllE..till abt 2 bah..hmmM tireD..yawn..hahAz..hmmM..afTernoon slacK at home..eAT..sleeP..bath..hmm till aBt 6+den plae gameS..haha..lack rite..lol..deN eat fried rice..dunno y sho yummy!YUM yUM!hehe..online den check friendster..plae games..lol.. 2 ppl add me..haha..dunno hu is the geradine..lol*tink tink*hMMm..den go downstair eat eat..den cum baq at 10+..den online at 10.30 till 1am..hehe..den the tv show..channel U gt scary show..lol..altough i love it..but lazy to watch..hmmM..oh yea..omG!!next week so many things happening lor..haix..gd friend michelle gt skool open houSe...den my house downstair gt buffet..for the buddishist thingy..den if u cum can plae bball,eat..dunno ask hu to come..lol..u wan cum tell me k*wink*hehe..i plaeing runscape..sum lame game..lol..stop here le..bye..muackZZ..huggieS~hehe

hmMM..todAe ah..quiTe ok daE..hehe meEt my friendZ micheLLe den plaE bbAll wif yi wen,sieW khim,jean..buDden hor..jean cum late late..haha..after we plaE finish den she cum..sorry hor michelle..nv intro u to dem..next time k..*wink*hmM den todae after plae finish go queenway centre look at soccer jershey..hmm next time i make bball jershey..guyZ if u wan tell me k..hehe we nid many ppl..abt 20..hmmm..after tt we go eat mac..den sum1..like give me atttitude lor..den go out of the mac to go home..den i bounce the bball hard cos yi wen keep saeing bounce summore bounce summore..lol..den i bounce hard lor!..deN the bball went to middle of the road!omG!!den i ran without looking at the traffic..den i kick the bball..cos no time to pick up..haha..cos car cuming..den i went baq..den michelle sae..u wan die also no nid die liddat rite..den i tok tok lor..abit onli..cos nt veri happy..cos the attitude she give ma..hmmm den i on bus..den i msg her ..tell herr wad i wanna sae lor..den after she explain..den i tink is misunderstanding lor..hmmm..nvm la michelle..i dun blame u and i nt angry k.. u wan do wad do lor..i cannot control u rite*wink*hehe..den she dis few daes cannot msg ba..coscard no money..den muz top-up..hmmm..will miss u de worx..haha..[miss u and love u k darling][muackZZ]hmmM.. yea..den i went to lot1..take plae arcade wif yi wen,siew khim,jean...den take neoprint..sho funni!..hahas..hmmm den went home..bath,warm up fiood..den online..now toking on fone wif my stead..lol..i stop here k..haha..bye muackZZ!!!

hmMm..todAE..lol..*aheM*20/08/04..lol..get tO poinT..lol..quitE a gd daEs..hmm..aftEr skool i weNt to plaE bbalL..den 3/4 wanna plae 4vs4..den we plae lor..ya..den a guy name call wee kiat..like pek check or wad..staRt to plaE rough!i tink cos 1 of my plaYer accidentally push him ba.. wad a xiao qi gui!!LOL..den i guard him..and anyhow bang me..lol..nvm give dis xiao qi gui a chance la..like woman liddat..sho xiao qi..16yr old dis yr leh..u nt baby anymore lor..although they win..but they like almost all of their best member plae wif us..we juz like onli gt 2 best plaer vs they 4 lor..but we lose to onli 3 point lor..i tot they sho pro..tsk tsk..a piece of shit!!LOL..!HmMM..veri pai seh abt meeting chio bu tml..lol..cos.. like a ugly guy go meet pretty gal lor..lol*worriED*hahas..hmmM..sho tired..yawn..ZzZZzZZz..lol..i stop herE le..hmmM buaix k..muackZZx

hmmM..juZ cambe baQ frm skool..cos plaeing bball..sho tired..LOL..den gt 1 gal ask me go plae bball wif her..cos she no track and field..budden i shy to see her ma..hahaS..den i tink she angry wif me..*sob-Sob*hmm.. she veri nice de..sweet,cute,pretty too!hahAs..she juz a great gal[in shOrt]hmmm.. nvm la..its my fault anyways..hmmm todae gt math test..lol.. i tink i can get 12+/14..lol..gt math hw..omg!so easy still wan us do..waste my time..hahaS..yaWn..me go bath liao..sho smeLLy!!lol..byE..muackZZz..tk guyZ*winK*
